price: 111. Dan barang siapa berbuat dosa, maka sesungguhnya dia mengerjakannya untuk (kesulitan) dirinya sendiri. Dan Allah Maha Mengetahui, Mahabijaksana.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innamā yaksibuhu ʿalā nafsihi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
